originalText.text: I am writing a long-overdue review for the min-lift that I had done with Dr. Shahar. I went to him in late April looking and feeling older than I am (51) and expressed that I thought I needed a full facelift. After a long consultation and thoughtful discussion, Dr. Shahar said that he that he would do what I wanted but said that a full facelift wasn't needed and that a mini-lift would provide the result I wanted. On the day of my surgery I was nervous, but both he and Gila both made me feel comfortable and calm. Afterwards, they both checked on me every day with phone calls and by the time I went for my first check-up I felt like my previous self again! The two people I told about my procedure say I look like I did 10 years ago, and everyone else asks about my skin-care routine and comments how "rested" I look. Trusting someone with your face is a major decision and I cannot emphasize enough how fortunate and grateful I am that I found Dr. Shahar (and Gila).

text.text: I am writing a long-overdue review for the min-lift that I had done with Dr. Shahar. I went to him in late April looking and feeling older than I am (51) and expressed that I thought I needed a full facelift. After a long consultation and thoughtful discussion, Dr. Shahar said that he that he would do what I wanted but said that a full facelift wasn't needed and that a mini-lift would provide the result I wanted. On the day of my surgery I was nervous, but both he and Gila both made me feel comfortable and calm. Afterwards, they both checked on me every day with phone calls and by the time I went for my first check-up I felt like my previous self again! The two people I told about my procedure say I look like I did 10 years ago, and everyone else asks about my skin-care routine and comments how "rested" I look. Trusting someone with your face is a major decision and I cannot emphasize enough how fortunate and grateful I am that I found Dr. Shahar (and Gila).

originalText.text: Had a secondary rhino and lower blepharoplasty . Everything went great and smooth , amazing results that I’m loving! The care and attention I got from day 1 was above and beyond. My recovery went super smooth and easy. If you’re looking for a trusted surgeon - I def would recommend dr .Shahar and his team .

My recovery went super smooth and easy. If you’re looking for a trusted surgeon - I def would recommend dr .Shahar and his team .

originalText.text:
I recently had a life-changing rhinoplasty procedure performed by Doctor Shahar, and I cannot express enough how satisfied I am with the results. From start to finish, my experience was nothing short of exceptional.

Right from my initial consultation, it was evident that Dr.Shahar was not only knowledgeable but also possessed a keen eye for detail. He effortlessly identified the aspects of my nose that needed improvement, showcasing his expertise in the field. It was reassuring to be in the hands of someone who clearly knew what they were doing.

Throughout the entire process, Dr. Shahar demonstrated an exceptional level of patience and a great sense of humor, which put me at ease and alleviated any pre-surgery jitters I had. His ability to maintain a warm and supportive demeanor created a comfortable environment, allowing me to openly discuss my goals and concerns.

Now, let's talk about the results—I am absolutely thrilled with my new nose! Comparing the before and after pictures is like night and day. Dr.Shahars skill and precision have transformed my nose into exactly what I had envisioned. The natural-looking outcome has greatly boosted my confidence, and I couldn't be happier with the final outcome.

I have zero regrets about undergoing this rhinoplasty procedure. It has been a transformative experience, both physically and emotionally. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.Shahar to anyone considering a rhinoplasty or any other cosmetic procedure. His expertise, attention to detail, and ability to deliver exceptional results make him stand out from the rest.

Price was amazing.

Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Talented doctor and professional staff. Completely natural look. I turned 50 and just needed a refresh and the doctor did an incredible job.

text.text: Talented doctor and professional staff. Completely natural look. I turned 50 and just needed a refresh and the doctor did an incredible job.

originalText.text: Has been the best and  most positive experience I have ever had with plastic surgery. At an affordable price, Dr. Shahar did my eyes,  neck and lower face which resulted In my looking at least 15 years younger.  I feel great.  He is a true artist and actually listens to what your concerns are.  Also, Gila is wonderful as his assistant.   Think the world of Dr. Shahar and his team.  Wouldn't hesitate to recommend him!  Did a fabulous job on a friend also.      Debra
